entry.title: Architectural Creative Lighting - Custom LED Light Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 0.00

With the advent of LED Light Panel technologies, there has been a paradigm shift in how we perceive light. Your lighting design is no longer constrained to typical light fixtures and down lighting fundamentals. Made to order panels allow for easy customization and integration of backlighting into almost any application to create a one of a kind installation.

List of Creative Applications:

  • Hotel lobbies/reception desks
  • Feature corporate walls 
  • Entrance portals
  • Highlighting building facades
        Features & Benefits
        • Available in custom sizes and shapes
        • Can be used in "frameless" designs
        • High brightness (2,000 - 10,000 lux)
        • Aluminum heat sink technology to maximize LED lifespan (50,000 hours)
        • Low power consumption (70% less than fluorescent)
        • Energy saving and maintenance free
        • Superior consistent light quality
        • Advanced 3-year warranty
        • UL cUL Listed
        Each edge lit optical acrylic sheets is custom manufactured specific to the dimensions and/or shapes of your project. Please tell us more information about your project filling out the form below. We’ll get back to you within one business day.

entry.title: Architectural General Illumination - Custom LED Light Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 0.00

LED Light Sheet is a versatile backlighting unit which delivers bright, even illumination suitable for creative architectural lighting where shape and size is not pre-defined. Featuring a slim profile of 5mm or 8mm, our LED light panels can be employed create a dramatic wall of light.

List of Applications:

  • Break the commercial lighting boundary for interior designers and architects.
  • Define your own size, shape, brightness and color! Custom made LED panel is so versatile for creative architectural lighting design.
        Features & Benefits
        • Available in custom sizes and shapes
        • Can be used in "frameless" designs
        • High brightness (2,000 - 10,000 lux)
        • Aluminum heat sink technology to maximize LED lifespan (50,000 hours)
        • Low power consumption (70% less than fluorescent)
        • Energy saving and maintenance free
        • Superior consistent light quality
        • Advanced 3-year warranty
        • UL cUL Listed
        Each edge lit optical acrylic sheets is custom manufactured specific to the dimensions and/or shapes of your project. Please tell us more information about your project filling out the form below. We’ll get back to you within one business day.

entry.title: Retail Kiosk Product Display Backlighting - Custom LED Light Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 0.00

The retail display, featuring high end brands in cosmetics, liquor, jewelry or watches, demanded high quality lighting and, because of project time pressures, a very quick turnaround. We are able to deliver from concept to end product within 2-3 weeks.

List of Applications:

  • At only 5mm thick LED light panel is the best option to keep the display slim whilst still ensuring bright, even illumination that really enhanced the product display.
  • Custom size and shape LED panels for illuminated impressive product display designs.

entry.title: Backlit Panels for Onyx Countertops - Custom LED Light Panels
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lighting Geek
Type:
Price: 0.00

The custom made LED light panels are perfect backlighting solution for translucent stone like onyx, marble or alabaster. You can choose White, Warm White or RGB for your customized decorative translucent panels.

List of Applications:

  • Backlit Bar Tops & Back Bars: Backlighting a full wall scape or creating attention around an illuminated bar top.
  • Backlit semi-precious translucent stones as well as designer resins, acrylics and solid surface materials. LED light illuminated countertops at any shape.
  • Backlit wall tiles with illuminated LED Light Panel for interior designs and corporate identity decoration.
Features & Benefits
  • Available in custom sizes and shapes
  • Can be used in "frameless" designs
  • High brightness (2,000 - 10,000 lux)
  • Aluminum heat sink technology to maximize LED lifespan (50,000 hours)
  • Low power consumption (70% less than fluorescent)
  • Energy saving and maintenance free
  • Superior consistent light quality
  • Advanced 3-year warranty
  • UL cUL Listed
Each edge lit optical acrylic sheets is custom manufactured specific to the dimensions and/or shapes of your project. Please tell us more information about your project filling out the form below. We’ll get back to you within one business day.
